strapiPost.title: Yarn/Wire Debuts Forest Concerts Series At The Momentary
strapiPost.content:
NYC-based piano and percussion quartet Yarn/Wire is coming to the Momentary Mar 3-5 for the US premiere of Forest Concerts.

  • Enchanted forest: Commissioned by the Momentary and composed by Ã˜yvind Torvund, this family-oriented, interactive performance combines energetic music, narration, comics, and sound to create an environment where kids and adults can invent, discover, and collect sounds.
  • Quartet's cause: Yarn/Wire promotes creative, experimental new music in the US and abroad by supporting composers and audiences through live performances, educational activities, and large-scale collaborative projects.

Tickets are $30 and can be purchased HERE.
